definition[0]: one of the people, organizations, or countries that signs an official agreement
example[0]: The UK is a signatory to the Berne Convention.
example[1]: the signatories of the Helsinki Declaration
definition[1]: one of the people or countries that sign an official agreement
example[2]: We will accept a copy invoice which bears a company stamp and the signature of an authorised signatory.
example[3]: Most Western countries are signatories to this agreement.
example[4]: Experts from 118 signatory countries met in Geneva.
